1{-# LANGUAGE ScopedTypeVariables #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Relational compositions whose contents are maybe the empty.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Cox.Empty
7  ( ropsCoxEmpty,
8    -- * both
9    consBoth, relmapBoth,
10    -- * maybe
11    consMaybe, relmapMaybe, relkitMaybe,
12    -- * maybe with restriction
13    MeetOnly,
14    relmapMaybeOnly,
15    -- * compose-maybe
16    consComposeMaybe, relmapComposeMaybe,
17  ) where
18
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.DataPlus          as K
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core              as C
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base          as Rop
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat          as Rop
23import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base.Message  as Msg
24
25
26-- | Relmap operators that handles empties.
27ropsCoxEmpty :: (K.CContent c) => [C.Rop c]
28ropsCoxEmpty = Rop.rops "cox-empty"
29    [ consBoth
30      K.& [ "both R [-fill E] [-share /P ...]"
31            K.& "-relmap/ . -fill? -share?" ]
32    , consComposeMaybe
33      K.& [ "compose-maybe R [-fill E] [-share /P ...]"
34            K.& "-relmap/ . -fill? -share?" ]
35    , consMaybe
36      K.& [ "maybe R [-fill E] [-share /P ...]"
37            K.& "plain : -relmap/ . -fill? -share?"
38          , "maybe R -only E [-fill E] [-share /P ...]"
39            K.& "only : -relmap/ . -only -fill? -share?"
40          , "maybe R -only E -order /P ... [-top N] [-mid N] [-bot N] [-fill E] [-share /P ...]"
41            K.& "count : -relmap/ . -only -order -top? -mid? -bot? -fill? -share?"
42          , "maybe R -only E -order /P ... -part N -of N [-fill E] [-share /P ...]"
43            K.& "ratio : -relmap/ . -only -order -part -of -fill? -share?" ]
44    ]
45
46
47-- ----------------------  both
48
49-- | __both R -share \/P ... -fill E__
50consBoth :: (K.CContent c) => C.RopCons c
51consBoth med =
52    do rmap <- Rop.getRelmap med "-relmap"
53       fill <- Rop.getFiller med "-fill"
54       sh   <- Rop.getMaybe Rop.getTerms med "-share"
55       Right $ relmapBoth med sh fill rmap
56
57-- | Create @both@ relmap.
58relmapBoth :: (Ord c, K.CRel c) => C.Intmed c -> Rop.SharedTerms -> c -> K.Map (C.Relmap c)
59relmapBoth med sh fill rmap = C.relmapCopy med "i" rmapBoth where
60    rmapBoth = rmapL K.++ Rop.relmapJoin med sh rmapR
61    rmapR    = rmap  K.++ relmapMaybe med sh fill rmapIn
62    rmapL    = relmapMaybe med sh fill rmap
63    rmapIn   = C.relmapLocalSymbol med "i"
64
65
66-- ----------------------  maybe
67
68-- | [maybe /R/ -share /\/P/ ... -fill /E/]
69--     Meet input and given relation /R/.
70--     It keeps input tuples of which counterparts are totally negated.
71--   [maybe /R/ -only /E/ -order /\/P/ ... -top /N/ -mid /N/ -bot /N/]
72--     Maybe with restriction by /E/ and limit to /N/ tuples.
73--   [maybe /R/ -only /E/ -order /\/P/ ... -part /N/ -of /N/]
74--     Maybe with restriction by /E/ and take /N/'th part.
75--
76consMaybe :: (K.CContent c) => C.RopCons c
77consMaybe med =
78    do rmap <- Rop.getRelmap med "-relmap"
79       fill <- Rop.getFiller med "-fill"
80       sh   <- Rop.getMaybe Rop.getTerms med "-share"
81       case Rop.getTag med of
82         t | t "plain" -> Right $ relmapMaybe med sh fill rmap
83           | t "only"  -> maybeOnly sh fill rmap $ Right K.def
84           | t "count" -> maybeOnly sh fill rmap $ Rop.getPotionCountR med
85           | t "ratio" -> maybeOnly sh fill rmap $ Rop.getPotionRatioR med
86           | otherwise -> Msg.unkTag
87    where
88      maybeOnly sh fill rmap createPortion =
89          do cops  <- Rop.getLetR med
90             cox   <- Rop.getCox med "-only"
91             portion <- createPortion
92             Right $ relmapMaybeOnly med ((sh, cops, cox, portion), fill) rmap
93
94-- | Create @maybe@ relmap.
95relmapMaybe :: (Ord c, K.CRel c) => C.Intmed c -> Rop.SharedTerms -> c -> K.Map (C.Relmap c)
96relmapMaybe med sh = C.relmapBinary med . relkitMaybe sh
97
98-- | Create @maybe@ relkit.
99relkitMaybe :: forall c. (Ord c, K.CRel c) => Rop.SharedTerms -> c -> C.RelkitBinary c
100relkitMaybe sh fill (C.RelkitOutput he2 kitb2) (Just he1) = kit3 where
101    pk     = K.termPicker he1 he2
102    pick1  = K.pkLShare pk
103    cut2   = K.pkRProper pk
104    split2 = K.pkRSplit pk
105
106    he3  = he2 K.++ he1
107    kit3 = case Rop.unmatchShare sh pk of
108             Nothing     -> Right $ C.relkitConflWhole False he3 f [kitb2]
109             Just (e, a) -> Msg.unmatchShare e a
110
111    f :: [C.BodyMap c] -> C.BodyMap c
112    f bmaps bo1 =
113        do let [bmap2] = bmaps
114           bo2 <- bmap2 bo1
115           let b2map = K.gatherToMap (split2 <$> bo2)
116           Right $ step b2map K.<++> bo1
117
118    heFill = cut2 $ K.headTypes he2
119    fills  = selectFiller fill <$> heFill
120    step b2map cs1 = case pick1 cs1 `K.lookupMap` b2map of
121                       Just b2prop -> map (++ cs1) b2prop
122                       Nothing     -> [fills ++ cs1]
123
124relkitMaybe _ _ _ _ = C.relkitUnfixed
125
126selectFiller :: (K.CRel c) => c -> K.Type -> c
127selectFiller _ t@(K.TypeRel _) = K.pRel $ K.Rel (K.Head t) []
128selectFiller fill _ = fill
129
130
131-- ----------------------  maybe with restriction
132
133-- | Parameter for @meet -only@.
134type MeetOnly c = (Rop.SharedTerms, K.CopSet c, K.Cox c, K.RelPortion)
135
136-- | Create @maybe@-with-restriction relmap.
137relmapMaybeOnly :: (K.CContent c) => C.Intmed c -> (MeetOnly c, c) -> K.Map (C.Relmap c)
138relmapMaybeOnly med p = C.relmapBinary med $ relkitMaybeOnly p
139
140-- | Create @maybe@-with-restriction relkit.
141relkitMaybeOnly :: forall c. (K.CContent c) => (MeetOnly c, c) -> C.RelkitBinary c
142relkitMaybeOnly ((sh, cops, cox, portion), fill) (C.RelkitOutput he2 kitb2) (Just he1) = kit3 where
143    pk     = K.termPicker he1 he2
144    pick1  = K.pkLShare pk
145    cut2   = K.pkRProper pk
146    split2 = K.pkRSplit pk
147
148    he3  = he2 K.++ he1
149    kit3 = case Rop.unmatchShare sh pk of
150             Nothing     -> Right $ C.relkitConflWhole False he3 f [kitb2]
151             Just (e, a) -> Msg.unmatchShare e a
152
153    f :: [C.BodyMap c] -> C.BodyMap c
154    f bmaps bo1 =
155        do let [bmap2] = bmaps
156           bo2 <- bmap2 bo1
157           let b2map = K.gatherToMap (split2 <$> bo2)
158           step b2map K.<#++> bo1
159
160    heFill = cut2 $ K.headTypes he2
161    fills  = selectFiller fill <$> heFill
162    step b2map cs1 =
163        case pick1 cs1 `K.lookupMap` b2map of
164          Nothing     -> Right [fills ++ cs1]
165          Just b2prop -> do bo3 <- K.filterM keep ((++ cs1) <$> b2prop)
166                            case bo3 of
167                              [] -> Right [fills ++ cs1]
168                              _  -> Right $ K.takeRelPortion portion he3 bo3
169
170    keep cs = do c <- K.calcCox cops he3 cs cox
171                 case K.isBool c of
172                   True  -> Right $ K.gBool c
173                   False -> Msg.reqBool
174
175relkitMaybeOnly _ _ _ = C.relkitUnfixed
176
177
178-- ----------------------  compose-maybe
179
180-- | __compose-maybe R -share \/P ... -fill E__
181--
182--  Construct relmap for relational composition.
183--
184consComposeMaybe :: (K.CContent c) => C.RopCons c
185consComposeMaybe med =
186    do rmap <- Rop.getRelmap med "-relmap"
187       fill <- Rop.getFiller med "-fill"
188       sh   <- Rop.getMaybe Rop.getTerms med "-share"
189       Right $ relmapComposeMaybe med sh fill rmap
190
191-- | Create @compose-maybe@ relmap.
192relmapComposeMaybe :: (Ord c, K.CRel c) => C.Intmed c -> Rop.SharedTerms -> c -> K.Map (C.Relmap c)
193relmapComposeMaybe med sh fill = C.relmapBinary med $ Rop.relkitCompose m sh where
194    m sh2 = relkitMaybe sh2 fill
